title: What is the best portable ham radio? - Quora

response.answer_text: Make a list of what you expect from a portable ham radio. Go to a ham radio store and talk to a salesman and try different radios until you find the one that meets the things on your list. I bought a radio I thought would meet my needs but when I used it I found that too many things were buried deep within menus making the radio hard to use.
